}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *"2052500288" and "Rev: 1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Version with both chips on one side.
*"2052000270" is silkscreened [http://jiushu.blog.51cto.com/972756/477682/ on the board] (w/ internal images) :The "Rev:" <...> text is covered by a sticker. :Version with chips on different sides. :The device is using AR7010-AL1A and AR9287-BL1A. :The casing plastic is ABS+PC (resin code 7). <!-- extremely useful info in case one wants to recycle their $15+ wireless adapter (or just the shell) for some reason --> *Possible [http://forum.ubuntu-fr.org/viewtopic.php?id=1049241 6C:FD:B9 OUI] (''[[Proware]]'') Bus 002 Device 003: ID 0cf3:7015 Atheros Communications, Inc. TP-Link TL-WN821N v3 802.11n [Atheros AR7010+AR9287] :;Receiver sensitivity :270M: -68dBm w/ 10% PER :130M: -68dBm w/ 10% PER :108M: -68dBm w/ 10% PER :54M: -68dBm w/ 10% PER :11M: -85dBm w/ 8% PER :6M: -88dBm w/ 10% PER :1M: -90dBm w/ 8% PER
